column1: '''''lumbulë''''' (or ''lumbule'') is a [[Quenya]] word meaning "(heavy) shadow; dark shadow".<ref>{{FR
The word seems to be an extended/augmentative form of the word ''[[lumbe]]'' "gloom" (cf. ''[[tumba]]'' and ''[[tumbale]]''), from [[Sundocarme

column4: undulávë]] '''lumbulë'''; ('and all paths are drowned deep in '''shadow''';')

column1: In the ''Qenya Lexicon'' appears the [[Qenya]] word ''lumbo'' ("dark lowering cloud").<ref>{{PE
